title: CAITLYN ULT
body:
How many times have you guys tried to save someone from a cait ult, yet to have them wiggle around you and end up killing themselves... here is a solution that only you guys can solve.
The person being ulted should stand still and let people block it.
Or the person trying to block should stand still and let the ulted person go behind.

replies.body: I think it's funnier when people try to flash away from it.
Both people now stand still and the ult hits.
